'''Radiant Spincrystal 90''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Where She Will Return]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a platform, next to a jackal statue, inside the ruin that is located at [[Safhe Shatranj]].
